text: 9|25|tirccayayum dharalam (yud'dha) rangannalil allahu ninnale sahayiccittuntâ€Œ. hunain (yud'dha) divasattilum (sahayiccu.) atayat ninnalute ennapperuppam ninnale ahladam keallikkukayum ennal at ninnalkk yatearu prayeajanavum untakkatirikkukayum, bhumivisalamayittum ninnalkk itunniyatavukayum, anantaram ninnal pintirinneatukayum ceyta sandarbham
